SEARCH
Package org.team21.game.interfaces.observers

Interface Observable

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameEventLogger
public interface Observable
This interface defines the contract for an Observable object, which can be observed by multiple Observer objects. It provides methods to notify observers of changes, add new observers, and clear existing observers. Observables can send messages or notifications to their observers, allowing for communication between different components of the system. Implementing classes should use the notifyObservers method to send messages to registered observers, addObserver to add new observers, and clearObservers to remove all observers. Observers registered with an Observable will receive notifications when the Observable's state changes, facilitating the implementation of the Observer pattern.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Meet Boghani

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addObserver(Observer p_Observer)
    Adds a new observer to the list of registered observers.
    void
    clearObservers()
    Removes all observers from the list of registered observers.
    void
    notifyObservers(String p_String)
    Notifies all registered observers with the given message.

  • Method Details

    • notifyObservers

      void notifyObservers(String p_String)
      Notifies all registered observers with the given message.
      Parameters:
      p_String - The message or notification to send to observers

    • addObserver

      void addObserver(Observer p_Observer)
      Adds a new observer to the list of registered observers.
      Parameters:
      p_Observer - The observer object to add

    • clearObservers

      void clearObservers()
      Removes all observers from the list of registered observers. After calling this method, the Observable will not notify any observers until new ones are added.
